data.title: Town of Santa Maria Coghinas ZIP 07030 (SS) Sardegna, Italy. Full data and useful information also on COVID
data.text:
Data about population living in Santa Maria Coghinas

NOTICE: in what follows data refers to Santa Maria Coghinas, where rises the City Hall of Santa Maria Coghinas, (and then not to the whole territory of Santa Maria Coghinas). For the sake of simplicity we will us the term of Santa Maria Coghinas.

In Santa Maria Coghinas live one thousand, two hundred and fourty-four people: six hundred and twelve are males and six hundred and thirty-two are females.

There are five hundred and seventy-seven singles (three hundred and ten males and two hundred and sixty-seven females). There are five hundred and eighteen people married, and twenty-seven people legally separed. There are also twenty-one divorced people and one hundred and one widows and widowers.

Please find in what follows the table of the distribution of inhabitants by age.

Data about foreigners living in Santa Maria Coghinas

In Santa Maria Coghinas live nineteen foreigners, five are males and fourteen are females. 18 come from Europa, 1 from Africa, 0 from America, 0 from Asia and 0 from Oceania.

Please find in what follows the table of the distribution of foreigners by age.

Education in Santa Maria Coghinas

There are in Santa Maria Coghinas one thousand, two hundred and two people in school age, five hundred and ninety-two are males and six hundred and ten females.

Employment rates and workers in Santa Maria Coghinas

There are in Santa Maria Coghinas 556 people aged 15 years or more. 444 are employed and 83 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 332 males aged 15 years or more, 261 are employed and 55 were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job. There are 224 females aged 15 years or more, 183 are employed and 28 s were previously employed but now are unemployed and seeking for a new job.

Families and their compositions

There are in Santa Maria Coghinas 559 families, for a total of 1244 people.

Please find in what follows a table showing the number of families along with the number of people for each family.

There are 559 famiglie living in Santa Maria Coghinas. 73 live in rented houses, 418 live in houses of their own property√Ç and 68 live in houses for different reasons.

The buildings and their characteristics in Santa Maria Coghinas

There are in Santa Maria Coghinas 543 buildings, but only 518 are used. 477 buildings are for residential use, 41 buildings are for commercial or productive pourposes. Among the 477 buildings for residential use 424 were build using bricks of tuffs, 45 were built using concrete and 8 were built using other materials like steel, wood and so on. Among the 477 buildings for residential use 63 are in excellent condition, 349 are in good conditions, 64 are in mediocre conditions and 1 are in bad conditions.

In the following three tables the buildings built for residential use in Santa Maria Coghinas are classified by building year, by floors number and by rooms number.
